summary: The Housing Affordability Act (S. 1527) amends Title II of the National Housing Act to modify multifamily loan limits. It adjusts these limits, indexed to the Price Deflator Index of Multifamily Residential Units Under Construction. The bill replaces numerous dollar amounts specified in various sections of the Act (206A, 207, 213, 220, 221, 231, and 234) with significantly higher figures, effectively increasing the maximum loan amounts available for multifamily housing projects.
